data.text: Aduan sakoo a asomdwoe wɔ ho
Ɔsomfo nyansafo bedi ɔba nimguasefo so,
Kyɛmfɛre wɔ hɔ ma dwetɛ na fononoo wɔ hɔ ma sikakɔkɔɔ
Omumɔyɛfo tie nsusuwii bɔne;
Nea odi ahiafo ho fɛw no bu wɔn Yɛfo animtiaa;
Nananom yɛ mmasiriwa anuonyam,
Anotew nye mma ɔkwasea,
Nea ɔma adanmude no hu sɛ ɛyɛ suman;
Nea obu nʼani gu mfomso so no ma ɔdɔ kwan,
Animka sɔ onipa a ɔwɔ nhumu ani
Onipa bɔnefo ani wɔ atuatew nko ara so
Eye sɛ wubehyia sisi a wɔawia ne mma
Sɛ obi de bɔne tua papa so ka a,
Ntɔkwaw mfiase te sɛ nea wɔretue suka;
Sɛ wobegyaa nea odi fɔ ne sɛ wobebu nea odi bem kumfɔ no,
Sika a ɛwɔ ɔkwasea nsam so nni mfaso,
Adamfo kyerɛ ɔdɔ bere nyinaa mu,
Obi a onni adwene no na ɔde ne nsa hyɛ krataa ase di akagyinamu
Nea ɔpɛ ntɔkwaw no dɔ bɔne;
Onipa a ɔwɔ porɔwee koma no nnya nkɔso;
Nea ɔwo ɔbakwasea no di awerɛhow,
Koma mu anigye yɛ aduru, ɛsa ɔyare,
Omumɔyɛfo gye adanmude wɔ sum ase
Onipa a ɔwɔ nhumu no ani kɔ nyansa so,
Ɔbakwasea hyɛ nʼagya awerɛhow,
Enye sɛ wɔtwe nea odi bem aso,
Onimdefo dwene nʼanom kasa ho,
Mpo sɛ ɔkwasea yɛ dinn a wobu no sɛ onyansafo,
